PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-12702010-10-21,  ,  ,  ,  HEALTH
ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Benzodiazepines and Other Targeted Substances Regulations (Miscellaneous Program).
PrecisRegulations Amending the BENZODIAZEPINES AND OTHER TARGETED SUBSTANCES REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program), in order to address administrative issues raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations to ensure greater clarity of the application of the Regulations and consistency in both official languages. This amendments will also bring more clarity to the conditions under which the Minister of Health's discretionary authority can be invoked.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0223 Publication Date: 2010-11-10
AttachmentsAttachment
